data.title: Time Zone & Clock Changes in Gombe, Gombe, Nigeria
data.meta_description: Historic, present and future dates for daylight saving time and clock changes. Time changes between years 2020 and 2029 in Nigeria – Gombe – Gombe are shown here.

The graph above shows that there is no clock change in Gombe during 2024.

Time Changes in Gombe Over the Years

Daylight Saving Time (DST) changes do not necessarily occur on the same date every year.

Time zone changes for:

YearDate & TimeAbbreviationTime ChangeOffset After2020 — 2029No changes, UTC +1 hour all of the period

* All times are local Gombe time.

Data for the years before 1970 is not available for Gombe, however, we have earlier time zone history for Lagos available.
